page.title: 19SPORT & LEISURE IN ABERDOUR
page.content: In our area there are quite a lot of sports clubs.The biggest ones are {Aberdour golf club,Aberdour sailing {club}and{Aberdour bowling}club.The golf club is very popular.There are {413}men members and{245}lady members and also{59}junior members.It costs about{Â£100}per season to join.The club was founded in{1896}and has been popular since then.The bowling club isn't quite as popular as the golf club.It has{60}members and the most popular day for playing is{Monday.}The sailing club is also quite popular.It has{95}members and they own{35}boats. It costs{Â£20}per year for an adult membership, and Â£10 per year for a junior under{18.}It was founded in {1930.}They hold races and regattas on the{River Forth}during the summer months.There are also{badminton,tennis {,squash,football}and{rugby clubs.
